about_me.title: About me

paragraphs.0: I'm {yearsOld} years old and programmer since 13 years old and located in Brazil. I Have skills in frontend and backend development.
paragraphs.1: I'm always learning new things and always trying to improve my skills. I love to read books, watch movies, listen music, play games and obviously program.
paragraphs.2: I'm a high school student and available for jobs in anywhere.

skills_list: Mobile development (React Native, Firebase and Expo)

my_projects.title: Featured Projects
my_projects.subtitle: These are my projects designed and developed by me. The images will take you to the repository on my Github. All projects here are personal. I've never done a professional project, but I'm looking for new Job opportunities. For more projects <link> visit my Github</link>.

contact.title: Contact Me
contact.subtitle: Contact me for more infos, jobs opportunities, freelance and others questions.

call_to_blog.title: Hey, visit my blog!
call_to_blog.subtitle: Read my tech posts, daily development, details of my projects and more. Every week have new posts!
